Class DopplerShift

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.spectroscopy.DopplerShift
public class DopplerShift extends Object
Doppler shift and redshift calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    hubbleDistance(double z, double H0)
    Cosmological distance estimate using Hubble law. d = v / H0 = c * z / H0
    static double
    observedWavelength(double restWavelength, double velocityKmS)
    Calculates observed wavelength from rest wavelength and velocity. λ_obs = λ_rest * (1 + v/c)
    static double
    radialVelocity(double observedWavelength, double restWavelength)
    Calculates radial velocity from observed and rest wavelengths. v = c * (λ_obs - λ_rest) / λ_rest
    static double
    redshift(double observedWavelength, double restWavelength)
    Calculates redshift z from wavelengths. z = (λ_obs - λ_rest) / λ_rest
    static double
    redshiftToVelocity(double z, boolean relativisticCorrection)
    Converts redshift to radial velocity.
    static double
    velocityToRedshift(double velocityKmS, boolean relativisticCorrection)
    Converts velocity to redshift.

  • Method Details

    • radialVelocity

      public static double radialVelocity(double observedWavelength, double restWavelength)
      Calculates radial velocity from observed and rest wavelengths. v = c * (λ_obs - λ_rest) / λ_rest
      Parameters:
      observedWavelength - Observed wavelength
      restWavelength - Rest (lab) wavelength
      Returns:
      Radial velocity in same units as c (default: km/s)

    • redshift

      public static double redshift(double observedWavelength, double restWavelength)
      Calculates redshift z from wavelengths. z = (λ_obs - λ_rest) / λ_rest
      Parameters:
      observedWavelength - Observed wavelength
      restWavelength - Rest wavelength
      Returns:
      Redshift z

    • redshiftToVelocity

      public static double redshiftToVelocity(double z, boolean relativisticCorrection)
      Converts redshift to radial velocity. For z invalid input: '<'invalid input: '<' 1: v ≈ c * z For relativistic: v = c * ((1+z)² - 1) / ((1+z)² + 1)
      Parameters:
      z - Redshift
      relativisticCorrection - Use relativistic formula if true
      Returns:
      Velocity in km/s

    • velocityToRedshift

      public static double velocityToRedshift(double velocityKmS, boolean relativisticCorrection)
      Converts velocity to redshift. For v invalid input: '<'invalid input: '<' c: z ≈ v/c For relativistic: z = sqrt((1+v/c)/(1-v/c)) - 1
      Parameters:
      velocityKmS - Velocity in km/s
      relativisticCorrection - Use relativistic formula if true
      Returns:
      Redshift z

    • observedWavelength

      public static double observedWavelength(double restWavelength, double velocityKmS)
      Calculates observed wavelength from rest wavelength and velocity. λ_obs = λ_rest * (1 + v/c)

    • hubbleDistance

      public static double hubbleDistance(double z, double H0)
      Cosmological distance estimate using Hubble law. d = v / H0 = c * z / H0
      Parameters:
      z - Redshift
      H0 - Hubble constant (km/s/Mpc), typically ~70
      Returns:
      Distance in Mpc
